mapper.insert: insert into mb (id, passwd, nickname, age, gender, zip, address1, address2, email, phone1, phone2, phone3, intro, register, memberpoint, state, delcont, deldate) values(#{id},#{passwd},#{nickname},#{age},#{gender},#{zip},#{address1},#{address2}, #{email},#{phone1},#{phone2},#{phone3},#{intro},#{register},#{memberpoint},#{state}, #{delcont},#{deldate},#{profile, jdbcType=VARCHAR},sysdate,1)
mapper.select: select * from MemberLogin where id=#{id} and state=1
select * from MemberJoin where id=#{id} and name=#{name}
